page.title: 12Hartlepool Public Transport
page.content: The fare is calculated automatically by electronic machine with a digital readout, which is clearly displayed in the front of the vehicle. Hartlepool transport authority sets the costs per mile which all operators must charge. Daytime fares, 6.30a.m. - 11.30p.m. are at present 50p for the first half mile and 10p for each subsequent sixth of the first mile, equal to 80p for the first mile and 60p for each mile there after. Night time fares, 11.30p.m. - 6.30a.m. are 50p for the first third mile, 10p for each ninth of a mile, equal to Â£1.10p for the first mile and 90p for each mile there after. Private hire vehicles can only be hired as a result of a telephone call and their charges vary from operator to operator.
